  • Storage: 6 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD 4000 or better)

  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • Storage: 64 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2520 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 20 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • Additional Notes: HIGHLY recommended to install this game on your system SSD. This game is expected to run at 1080p and 60 FPS on low settings.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 20 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: HIGHLY recommended to install this game on your system SSD. This game is expected to run at 1080p and >40 FPS on high settings. You can change graphics settings to improve performance.
